in.srain.cube.app

Interface ICubeFragment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockMenuFragment, CubeFragment, MenuItemFragment, TitleBaseFragment

    public interface ICubeFragment
    provide some method to make Fragment act like Activity in BackStack

    When a Fragment becomes invisible totally, onLeave() will be called.

    When a Fragment becomes visible from totally invisible, onBack() or onBackWithData(Object) will be called.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      void onBackWithData(java.lang.Object data)

      pass the data from CubeFragmentActivity.pushFragmentToBackStack(Class, Object)to this fragment
      void onLeave() 
      boolean processBackPressed()
      process the return back logic return true if back pressed event has been processed and should stay in current view
